column5: How to play the Mexico US trade tariffsTrade data between the US and Mexico shows that 23 of all imports from Mexico into the US are relatedparty transactions ie its trade by US companies using Mexico for production Further the biggest import categories from Mexico to the US are cars and car parts and trucks and buses As a result expect the news to be materially negative for Auto stocks and auto parts manufacturers According to Bloomberg Mexican tariffs alone will create an estimate 12 hit for FiatChrysler earnings Additionally there are new fears that the Mexico tariffs will also raise the chances that the White House will finally go ahead with tariffs on auto imports from the EUNames affected F GM FCAU DLPH ORLY
